mapper.insert: insert into history_trading(symbol, open_time, close_time, action, size_lot, open_price, close_price, profit, myfxbook_id) values(#{symbol}, #{openTime}, #{closeTime}, #{action}, #{sizeLot}, #{openPrice}, #{closePrice}, #{profit}, #{myfxbookId})
mapper.update: update history_trading set symbol = #{symbol}, open_time = #{openTime}, close_time = #{closeTime}, action = #{action}, size_lot = #{sizeLot}, open_price = #{openPrice}, close_price = #{closePrice}, profit = #{profit}, myfxbook_id = #{myfxbookId} where id=#{id}
mapper.sql: b.id as id, b.symbol as symbol, b.open_time as openTime, b.close_time as closeTime, b.action as action, b.size_lot as sizeLot, b.open_price as openPrice, b.close_price as closePrice, b.profit as profit, b.myfxbook_id as myfxbookId
